ref: 10276 mr̥ṇāˊti ʻ crushes ʼ AV., mr̥ṇáti RV., ʻ threshes ʼ ŚBr. 2. Pp. mūrṇá -- 1 AV. 3. *mr̥ṇṇa -- . [*mr̥ṇṇa -- from pres. stem (or < *mr̥dna -- , cf. mr̥ditá -- ʻ pressed down, squeezed ʼ AV.: √mr̥d). -- &rcirclemacr 1. Pa. maṇāti ʻ crushes, destroys ʼ; Kho. brunik ʻ to bite, chew (e.g. parched grain) ʼ; K. munun ʻ to pound grain, husk (in a mortar) ʼ, munan f. ʻ act of so doing ʼ.
